example.name: transitive
example.text: `` The events of April through June damaged the respect and confidence which most Americans previously had [*T*-1] for the leaders of China . ''
example.arg: The events of April through June
the respect and confidence which most Americans previously had [*T*-1] for the leaders of China

example.name: passive with adverbials
example.text: Prices rose on the news that [a sizable West German refinery]-1 was damaged [*-1] in a fire , [*] tightening an already tight European market .
example.arg: [*] tightening an already tight European market

predicate.note: Frames file for 'damage' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
